title: Relaxing Relais & Châteaux Stay in Kovalam with Daily Dining & Cocktails
description: Sitting pretty on a cliff edge, surrounded by swaying coconut groves and with uninterrupted views of the Arabian Sea, Niraamaya Retreats Surya Samudra invites you to connect with nature and yourself. Part of the renowned Relais & Châteaux brand, this paradise in Kovalam beckons you with its traditionally designed accommodation, epicurean cuisine and a wide range of holistic wellness programmes. Overlooking a secluded beach, this Kerala oasis is perfect for wellness-seekers and beach-lovers.
offer_address: Poovar - Vizhinjam Rd Vizhinjam, Kovalam, Mullur, Kerala 695521
